abstract: Australia’s Foreign Investment Board will extend its review of the Aluminum Corporation of China‘s $19.5 billion investment in the global miner Rio Tinto, Reuters reported, citing an unnamed source.
lead_paragraph: Australia’s Foreign Investment Board will extend its review of the Aluminum Corporation of China‘s $19.5 billion investment in the global miner Rio Tinto, Reuters reported, citing an unnamed source.

headline.main: Chinalco’s Rio Tinto Investment Said to Face More Scrutiny
